pkgmetadata.longdescription: # A pixel-level label tools for plant pictures taken by drones.## Implement Python version >= 3.6.5, QGIS version >=3.4#### RUN ```pip3 install plantlabeller``` to install from terminal#### ***Need to modify matplotlibrc file (if crashed)*** ADD: ```backend: TkAgg```#### ***GDAL instllation instruction:***1. RUN ```pip3 install GDAL==2.4.2``` - if failed with error: > gdal-config not found - go to step 2.2. RUN ```brew install gdal```, go to step 1 - if failed with "gcc" go to step 33. RUN ```brew reinstall gcc```, go to step 1
